pkgmetadata.longdescription: Changepoint-Aware Ensemble for Probabilistic Modeling // Implements a changepoint-aware ensemble forecasting algorithm that combines Theta, TBATS (Trigonometric, Box-Cox transformation, ARMA errors, Trend, Seasonal components), and ARFIMA (AutoRegressive, Fractionally Integrated, Moving Average) using a product-of-experts approach for robust probabilistic prediction.
